thread.title: Cleveland Cavaliers Play Trick on Fans with These Terrible Uniform Options
thread.title_full: Cleveland Cavaliers Play Trick on Fans with These Terrible Uniform Options

author: Jessica Kleinschmidt
title: Cleveland Cavaliers Play Trick on Fans with These Terrible Uniform Options
text:
Cleveland Cavaliers Play Trick on Fans with These Terrible Uniform Options FanDuel 2 hrs ago Jessica Kleinschmidt © FanDuel Insider Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James watches from the bench during a timeout during the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Philadelphia 76ers, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Philadelphia. Philadelphia won 115-114. (AP Photo/Matt Slocum) Cleveland Cavaliers owner Dan Gilbert had hinted on Twitter Wednesday that the team would sport new jerseys this season.
AdChoices Fair enough.
However, Gilbert showed three options and two out of three of them were just awful.
1 of these 3 will debut tonight at @CavsWGUnited event as a new @Cavs uni. Here’s a sneak peek. Which is your fav? pic.twitter.com/wjthgMhSSv
— Dan Gilbert (@cavsdan) October 21, 2015
I’m not entirely sure who thought of these designs. I also won’t admit that I find them aesthetically pleasing, but when it comes to being a basketball uniform, the Fashion Police would come out to arrest you. Don’t worry though, Cavaliers fans, according to USA Today’s For the Win , it was a joke.
Entering our 45th season by paying homage to the past. NEW CAVS JERSEYS: https://t.co/2sXLX6u8aS #CavsStyle pic.twitter.com/SyZDJ6rxr2 — Cleveland Cavaliers (@cavs) October 22, 2015
That’s not funny, Cavaliers. Some of us take fashion very seriously. And good luck trying to convince King James to wear something I wouldn’t even sit on as a blanket.
